name: FPS in CUI Lahore
description:
As we know, developing and releasing a game with the help of open-source game engines is now
much easier than ever before. So, using these open-source game engines, I am making an fps
multiplayer game. It will be for PC players because of its extensive graphics. The game has
“free for all” game mode and the player can make different rooms. It will also have a 3D map of
some of the areas of CUI Lahore Campus. Players will be connected to other players.
